top_lie_le_iff_le_normalizer:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
theorem top_lie_le_iff_le_normalizer (N' : lie_submodule R L M) :
    «expr⁅ , ⁆» («expr⊤» : lie_ideal R L) N ≤ N' ↔ N ≤ N'.normalizer :=
  by
  rw [lie_le_iff]
  tauto
#align top_lie_le_iff_le_normalizer top_lie_le_iff_le_normalizer
normalizer_inf:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊓ » -/
theorem normalizer_inf : («expr ⊓ » N₁ N₂).normalizer = «expr ⊓ » N₁.normalizer N₂.normalizer :=
  by
  ext
  simp [← forall_and]
#align normalizer_inf normalizer_inf
normalizer_eq_self_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⧸ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
theorem normalizer_eq_self_iff :
    H.normalizer = H ↔ (lie_module.max_triv_submodule R H <| «expr ⧸ » L H.to_lie_submodule) = «expr⊥» :=
  by
  rw [lie_submodule.eq_bot_iff]
  refine' ⟨fun h => _, fun h => le_antisymm (fun x hx => _) H.le_normalizer⟩
  · rintro ⟨x⟩ hx
    suffices x ∈ H by simpa
    rw [← h, H.mem_normalizer_iff']
    intro y hy
    replace hx : «expr⁅ , ⁆» _ (lie_submodule.quotient.mk' _ x) = 0 := hx ⟨y, hy⟩
    rwa [← LieModuleHom.map_lie, lie_submodule.quotient.mk_eq_zero] at hx
  · let y := lie_submodule.quotient.mk' H.to_lie_submodule x
    have hy : y ∈ lie_module.max_triv_submodule R H («expr ⧸ » L H.to_lie_submodule) :=
      by
      rintro ⟨z, hz⟩
      rw [← LieModuleHom.map_lie, lie_submodule.quotient.mk_eq_zero, coe_bracket_of_module, Submodule.coe_mk,
        mem_to_lie_submodule]
      exact (H.mem_normalizer_iff' x).mp hx z hz
    simpa using h y hy
#align normalizer_eq_self_iff normalizer_eq_self_iff
normalizer_bot_eq_max_triv_submodule:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
theorem normalizer_bot_eq_max_triv_submodule :
    («expr⊥» : lie_submodule R L M).normalizer = lie_module.max_triv_submodule R L M :=
  rfl
#align normalizer_bot_eq_max_triv_submodule normalizer_bot_eq_max_triv_submodule
monotone_normalizer:
@[mono]
theorem monotone_normalizer : Monotone (normalizer : lie_submodule R L M → lie_submodule R L M) :=
  by
  intro N₁ N₂ h m hm
  rw [mem_normalizer] at hm⊢
  exact fun x => h (hm x)
#align monotone_normalizer monotone_normalizer
mem_normalizer_iff':
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
theorem mem_normalizer_iff' (x : L) : x ∈ H.normalizer ↔ ∀ y : L, y ∈ H → «expr⁅ , ⁆» y x ∈ H :=
  by
  rw [Subtype.forall']
  rfl
#align mem_normalizer_iff' mem_normalizer_iff'
mem_normalizer_iff:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
theorem mem_normalizer_iff (x : L) : x ∈ H.normalizer ↔ ∀ y : L, y ∈ H → «expr⁅ , ⁆» x y ∈ H :=
  by
  rw [mem_normalizer_iff']
  refine' forall₂_congr fun y hy => _
  rw [← lie_skew, neg_mem_iff]
#align mem_normalizer_iff mem_normalizer_iff
mem_normalizer:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
/-

@[simp]
theorem mem_normalizer (m : M) : m ∈ N.normalizer ↔ ∀ x : L, «expr⁅ , ⁆» x m ∈ N :=
  iff.rfl
#align mem_normalizer mem_normalizer
lie_mem_sup_of_mem_normalizer:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ∙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ∙ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ⊔ » -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ∙ » -/
theorem lie_mem_sup_of_mem_normalizer {x y z : L} (hx : x ∈ H.normalizer) (hy : y ∈ «expr ⊔ » («expr ∙ » R x) ↑H)
    (hz : z ∈ «expr ⊔ » («expr ∙ » R x) ↑H) : «expr⁅ , ⁆» y z ∈ «expr ⊔ » («expr ∙ » R x) ↑H :=
  by
  rw [Submodule.mem_sup] at hy hz
  obtain ⟨u₁, hu₁, v, hv : v ∈ H, rfl⟩ := hy
  obtain ⟨u₂, hu₂, w, hw : w ∈ H, rfl⟩ := hz
  obtain ⟨t, rfl⟩ := submodule.mem_span_singleton.mp hu₁
  obtain ⟨s, rfl⟩ := submodule.mem_span_singleton.mp hu₂
  apply Submodule.mem_sup_right
  simp only [LieSubalgebra.mem_coe_submodule, smul_lie, add_lie, zero_add, lie_add, smul_zero, lie_smul, lie_self]
  refine' H.add_mem (H.smul_mem s _) (H.add_mem (H.smul_mem t _) (H.lie_mem hv hw))
  exacts[(H.mem_normalizer_iff' x).mp hx v hv, (H.mem_normalizer_iff x).mp hx w hw]
#align lie_mem_sup_of_mem_normalizer lie_mem_sup_of_mem_normalizer
le_normalizer:
theorem le_normalizer : H ≤ H.normalizer :=
  H.to_lie_submodule.le_normalizer
#align le_normalizer le_normalizer
ideal_in_normalizer:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
/-- A Lie subalgebra is an ideal of its normalizer. -/
theorem ideal_in_normalizer {x y : L} (hx : x ∈ H.normalizer) (hy : y ∈ H) : «expr⁅ , ⁆» x y ∈ H :=
  by
  rw [← lie_skew, neg_mem_iff]
  exact hx ⟨y, hy⟩
#align ideal_in_normalizer ideal_in_normalizer
gc_top_lie_normalizer:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⁅ , ⁆» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
theorem gc_top_lie_normalizer :
    GaloisConnection (fun N : lie_submodule R L M => «expr⁅ , ⁆» («expr⊤» : lie_ideal R L) N) normalizer :=
  top_lie_le_iff_le_normalizer
#align gc_top_lie_normalizer gc_top_lie_normalizer
exists_nested_lie_ideal_of_le_normalizer:
/-- A Lie subalgebra `H` is an ideal of any Lie subalgebra `K` containing `H` and contained in the
normalizer of `H`. -/
theorem exists_nested_lie_ideal_of_le_normalizer {K : LieSubalgebra R L} (h₁ : H ≤ K) (h₂ : K ≤ H.normalizer) :
    ∃ I : lie_ideal R K, (I : LieSubalgebra R K) = ofLe h₁ :=
  by
  rw [exists_nested_lie_ideal_coe_eq_iff]
  exact fun x y hx hy => ideal_in_normalizer (h₂ hx) hy
#align exists_nested_lie_ideal_of_le_normalizer exists_nested_lie_ideal_of_le_normalizer
comap_normalizer:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » -/
@[simp]
theorem comap_normalizer (f : «expr →ₗ⁅ , ⁆ » M' R L M) : N.normalizer.comap f = (N.comap f).normalizer :=
  by
  ext
  simp
#align comap_normalizer comap_normalizer
coe_normalizer_eq_normalizer:
theorem coe_normalizer_eq_normalizer : (H.to_lie_submodule.normalizer : Submodule R L) = H.normalizer :=
  rfl
#align coe_normalizer_eq_normalizer coe_normalizer_eq_normalizer
